alert.note: Alert for Chippewa; Kandiyohi; Swift (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 30 at 8:05PM CDT until September 30 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Chippewa County in west central Minnesota... Southeastern Swift County in west central Minnesota... Central Kandiyohi County in central Minnesota... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 805 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Clara City, or 17 miles east of Montevideo, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Willmar, Clara City, Raymond, Kerkhoven, Pennock, Kandiyohi, Willmar Airport, and Priam. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
